translations: v．斩首，砍头：将头部从身体上切除，通常用于死刑或暴力行为。
· The executioner was decapitating the prisoner.
行刑人正在将囚犯斩首。

phrs.translation: 杀头, 摘顶, 去头
胎儿断头套管, 详细翻译

sentences.sentence: A German man has gone on trial accused of decapitating his mother with a sword.
sentences.translation: 一名德国男子由于涉嫌用剑砍掉他母亲的头而遭到审讯。

sentences.sentence: This would be difficult to adapt to small coffee house theater type because a major part of the performance was the decapitating of a live chicken.
sentences.translation: 这一出行为艺术表演是很难在一个小咖啡馆中表演的，主要的原因是这出表演的主要部份是必须砍下一只活鸡的脑袋。
